Donuts

Back to Home

Ingredients

  • 2 1/4 tsp active dry yeast
  • 1/2 cup warm water
  • 1 cup warm milk
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 1 tsp salt
  • 2 eggs
  • 1/3 cup shortening
  • 4 cups all-purpose flour
  • Oil for frying
  • Pink glaze or icing

Instructions

  1. Dissolve yeast in warm water and let sit 5 minutes.
  2. Mix yeast mixture with milk, sugar, salt, eggs, shortening.
  3. Gradually add flour to make a soft dough.
  4. Knead dough, cover, and let rise for about 1 hour.
  5. Roll dough, cut donuts shapes, let rise again.
  6. Fry in hot oil until golden, drain on paper towels.
  7. Dip in pink glaze or icing and let set.
